meanings.definition: The quality or state of being rude.
meanings.sent1: Her rudeness towards the waiter was unacceptable.
meanings.sent2: I was shocked by the rudeness of his behavior.
meanings.sent3: Despite her rudeness, he couldn't help but find her amusing.
meanings.sent4: The rudeness of the storm was evident in the howling winds.
meanings.sent5: The teacher addressed the issue of rudeness in the classroom.

meanings.sent1: His rudeness in interrupting others was quite annoying.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't believe the rudeness of his comment.
meanings.sent3: The rudeness of the cat knocking over the vase was comical.
meanings.sent4: The rudeness of the alarm clock woke her up abruptly.
meanings.sent5: The rudeness of the graffiti on the wall was a blight on the neighborhood.
